column4: lol, ok i have a geforce go6400 graphics card and when i go to enable visual features i get the following error message the software sourse for the package nvidia-glx-new is not enabled. i press close, it says please run appearance/desktop effects again after restarting computer when the new graphics driver is active. i restart go back in i get the same set of messages?
i know, lol, how do i install them? :S
